Rob: note that in fixing bug 161867 I removed the task list view refersh call from the end of org.eclipse.mylar.internal.tasks.ui.actions.SynchronizeSelectedAction.run(), because we should not be refreshing the Task List explicitly.  I instead added a notifyContainerChanged call on the SynchronizationManager for each query as it is synchronized.

*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 161867 ***

Fixed duplicate.
